Title: X-Mouse Microsoft Touch Mouse Extender
Description: Maps the surface of the MS Touch Mouse to allow layer changing in X-Mouse Button Control.  This allows more versatility of assigning new buttons to the mouse.
HomeWiki:
X-Mouse Microsoft Touch Mouse Extender
{X-Mouse Button Control Layer Manipulation by the Touch Mouse}

This program is intended for use with X-Mouse Button Control.
http://www.highrez.co.uk/downloads/XMouseButtonControl.htm

It currently adds a single control point on the surface of the MS Touch Mouse that acts as a unique control key, which is then assigned to X-Mouse to change to a specific layer. It is planned to add several more points each with their own unique control codes, to allow access to different X-Mouse layers depending on which part of the mouse is covered.

Common uses
Middle Mouse Button: Assigning the Middle Control Point to Layer 2 in X-Mouse, and reassigning the Right Click to a Middle Click in that very layer. End result is a middle mouse button newly created in the center of your MS Touch Mouse.
